alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 04 at 2:50AM MST until March 05 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Far Northeast Highlands, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Dangerous crosswinds will be possible along I-25 from near Las Vegas to Raton Pass.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands
